val: An app that helps you track any cryptocurrency's current price also helps you to analyze the dip or rise in rate of crypto over a period of time using visual representation.It helps to fetch the rate of cryptos over a period of a year .An app that helps you track any cryptocurrency's current price also helps you to analyze the dip or rise in rate of crypto over a period of time using visual representation . Made using React JS it helps to fetch the rate of cryptos over a period of a year .so next time when going to invest in crypto please do check the current market trends to get a clear analysis of whats currently going around in the market.
